thread.title: 10 items to show off your love to the world If matching tattoos aren’t your thing
thread.title_full: 10 items to show off your love to the world If matching tattoos aren’t your thing

author: Steph Barnes
title: 10 items to show off your love to the world If matching tattoos aren’t your thing
text:
10 items to show off your love to the world If matching tattoos aren’t your thing There’s nothing quite like the feeling of making things (Facebook) official with the person you’ve been going out with for a while. Mostly because dating is hard, and who has the time? But when it comes to relationships, some people like to keep their love on the down low while others prefer to wear theirs for everyone to see…literally.
Along these lines, a lot of couples tend to go the matching tattoos route, but that might not be your thing. Sure, you want everyone to know that you’ve found your lobster , but maybe you’re not quite ready for the forever commitment of getting matching ink. We totally get it.
So, to help you show off your love to the world without worrying about the cost of laser tattoo removal in case of a break up, we’ve found you 10 amazing items. Valentine’s Day may be over, but that doesn’t mean you can treat yo’ self (and your significant other) to some super cute matching gifts. After all, you deserve it!
1. These distressed couple’s hats by PoetryAndPins 
PoetryAndPins
